data.event: Donald Trump and Jeffrey Epstein's social relationship begins in New York high society circles.
Donald Trump hosts a party at Mar-a-Lago with Jeffrey Epstein and 28 NFL cheerleaders.
Trump tells New York Magazine: "I've known Jeff for 15 years. Terrific guy."
Jeffrey Epstein is arrested by federal agents on federal sex trafficking charges.
Jeffrey Epstein is found dead in his Manhattan federal jail cell.
